resource_explanation: API to handel User resource. Authorization required.
explanation: Admin can delete all other users. "user" and guest type users can only delete their own records.

requests.curl:
curl "http://localhost:3000/users/4" -d '' -X DELETE \
	-H "Accept: application/json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
	-H "Authorization: bZrdnA2XAHvHGvzCd6hWn2Bx" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
	-H "Cookie: "
